alert.note: Alert for Adams (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 7:26PM EDT until June 26 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Adams County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 726 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bonneauville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hanover, Hampton, Littlestown, McSherrystown, Lake Meade, Bonneauville, New Oxford, East Berlin, Lake Heritage, Abbottstown, York Springs and Heidlersburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
